message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $800,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $950,000 is still significantly below my bottom line.  This product offers immense value, and I'm confident it will bring you a strong return on your investment. To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.
Thank you for your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet the price of $1,050,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000.
